title: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of AI
overview: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of A.I. is aimed at kids ages six to 12, and focuses on artificial intelligence, technology, climate change and space exploration. It revolves around a 12-year-old boy who accidentally creates an evil technology called Blink. With the support of his closest friends, Mansour must face the chaos and danger Blink causes in Salam City.
